our_goal_is_to_eliminate_the_hassle_of_l: Our goal is to eliminate the hassle of localization by providing tools to automate, integrate, and better manage your translations. Lokalise is a better way for growth-minded businesses to expand their mobile apps, games, software or digital content into multiple languages.
